head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Yonkers: City Agrees To Bronx River Cleanup Plan

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Yonkers: City Agrees To Bronx River Cleanup Plan
hedline.hl2: Yonkers: City Agrees to Bronx River Cleanup Plan

abstract.p: Yonkers, NY, agrees to state plan to clean up city's discharge of sewage into Bronx River (S)

block.p: The City of Yonkers has agreed to end its four-year opposition to a state plan to clean up the city's discharge of sewage into the Bronx River, Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo announced yesterday. The settlement, approved earlier this month by a State Supreme Court justice in Westchester County, calls for the city to pay $2.2 million for a study to identify sources of pollution and then to promptly clean up the sites identified by the study.
